attributes.action: MPs must stop trying to block or prevent a no deal Brexit
attributes.additional_details:
MP Yvette Cooper is going to table a bill that will force Parliament to chose between May's deal, which was voted down, and an extension of Article 50 meaning that we won't leave on march 29th. This is a horrible betrayal of the people and the European Union (Withdrawal) (No 3) Bill must not be allowed to be tabled.

https://www.google.com/amp/s/www.independent.co.uk/voices/brexit-deal-vote-theresa-may-second-referendum-vote-election-yvette-cooper-a8736216.html%3famp
attributes.background: MPs have been working to undermine the will of the people by preventing a no deal Brexit. Yvette Cooper is tabling a bill which will prevent no deal Brexit and this must not be allowed. MPs must stop trying to block no deal Brexit, we voted to leave with or without a deal. Stop betraying the people.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. 

You might like to sign one of these petitions:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/229963
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/224908

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
